name: MAX Rhythm
description:
How to Play

You play as Max, a funky cat who (quite literally) puts his whole body into every beat. Get in the groove and prove you can be oh so smoooooth. 

Morph into the shapes square, triangle or circle to match the beat.

Controls

Press ESC to return to the main menu whilst in a level.

Keyboard

Use either ASD or Left/Down/Right keys to morph Max into those shapes.

  Square - A / Left arrow
  Triangle - S / Down arrow
  Circle - D / Right arrow

PlayStation/DualShock

Use either Square/Triangle/Circle to morph into those shapes.

  Square
  Triangle 
  Circle
